Question
========

Jody is taking three courses: English, History and Mathematics. Assume the probability that she will get an 8 in all courses at the end of the semester ______. \ P(grade 8 on the English exam) = 0.70. P(grade 8 on the History exam) = 0.60. P(grade 8 on the math exam) = 0.50. \ The events are independent of each other. Then what is the probability that Jody will get an 8 for two subjects?

Answerlist
----------

* 0,09
* 0,14
* 0,21
* 0,44

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* 0.09: Incorrect
* 0.14: Incorrect
* 0.21: Incorrect
* 0.44: Correct
